title: Subtraction
text: Remember that f-g is the same as $$(f-g)(x)$$. All we have to do is subtract the two functions.
speech: Remember that f-g is the same as  times, parentheses f minus g,  of x . All we have to do is subtract the two functions.
pacedSpeech: Remember that f-g is the same as   times,  f minus g,  of x
. All we have to do is subtract the two functions.

title: Subtraction

subHints.title: Combining Like Terms
subHints.text: $$4x-12x=-8x$$, but there is no other $$x^2$$ term, so the final answer is $$2x^2-8x$$.
pacedSpeech: 4 x minus 12 x; is equal to negative 8 x
but there is no other x squared
term, so the final answer is 2 x squared, minus 8 x.

speech: What is  2 x squared, plus 4 x minus 12 x ?
pacedSpeech: What is   2 x squared, plus 4 x minus 12 x
